Question:
The 2004 anime "Samurai Champloo" features a character using a fighting style based on breakdancing. What is the name of this character? 
A) Jin
B) Mugen
C) Fuu
D) Kariya

In which year did Luis "Alien Ness" Martinez express his frustration with certain aspects of breakdancing in an interview with "The Super B-Beat Show"? 
A) 2009 
B) 2012 
C) 2015 
D) 2018

In the "Bust a Groove" video game franchise, which character is known for specializing in breakdancing? 
A) Kitty-N 
B) Heat 
C) Frida 
D) Strike

What term is used to refer to breakers who almost exclusively use power moves in their sets? 
A) Style heads 
B) Power heads 
C) Abstract heads 
D) Blow-up heads

Which TV show is credited with bringing breakdancing back to the forefront of pop culture in the United States? 
A) Dancing with the Stars 
B) So You Think You Can Dance 
C) The Voice 
D) America's Got Talent
